posts.author: EliHarel
posts.content: Now here's a challenge. Arelith opened a server where everyone begins at level 9, and is capped at level 9. Low magic, and you need at least 3 levels (straight) for any multiclass. Now... does anyone have any idea about something useful to do with just 9 levels? I know I want a melee character, but beyond, with just 9 levels, I can't think of much. Maybe Cleric.

posts.author: WhiZard
posts.content:
I see you have cut the SD out of the race (can't have more than 2 levels of it by level 9).

I have no idea what type of gear is available, but I bet a druid 6 shifter 3 might do well.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content: Pure dual-wielding ranger, maybe? You'll only need 13 DEX anyway. Plus a decent skill set and a fuzzy pal. Pretty easy to build, too.

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
If I was going to try this, I'd have to take Wiz 5/PM 4.

It gives me the spell slots of a lvl 7 Wizard, but the PM 4 gives me +4 AC (boneskin), an additional 8 HP, and 2 additional pets (animate dead, and summon undead).

You could possibly stretch this to Wiz 3/ PM 6 for an additional 6 hitpoints (Deathless vigor), undead graft, and a shadow instead of a Ghoul.

Over all I'd stay with the PM 4 as I wouldn't want to lose the lvl 4 spells. 7 PM would be interesting for the stun,hold, paralyzation immunity, but that would need 10 levels so it violates the 9 level cap.

This actually might be an interesting challenge to undertake. I my have to go look at this server one of these nights.

Conlaoch

posts.content: Fixed lvl characters are IMO a great idea, if just the right level is chosen. Lvl 9 is kinda meh, but whatever. posts.author: Templar
posts.content:
BTW rules for it:
1. PrC requirements rewritten as follows.
// AA - Elf/halfelf, bab3, weapon focus bow.
// Assassin - leave unchanged (hide/ms 8, evil).
// Blackguard - evil, BAB 3.
// Champion of Torm - non evil, BAB 3.
// Drag disciple - unchanged (lore 8, sorc/bard)
// Dw def - dwarf, lawful, BAB 3.
// Harper - non evil, lore 4, discipline 4
// Pale master - leave unchanged
// shadowdancer - hide/ms 8, tumble 5
// shifter - unchanged (3rd level druid spells)
// weapon master - bab 3, dodge, expertise

2. 3-level requirement removed entirely. You can now mix levels freely, within the usual limits of alignment etc.
